message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $10,000.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  To make this work for me, I would need to see a price closer to $12,500.  How does that sound?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I am willing to consider a price of $11,000 for the product. This is my best offer based on my budget.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,750? This would allow me to finalize the deal.
